overview: Glory 26: Amsterdam was a kickboxing event held on December 4, 2015 at the Amsterdam RAI in Amsterdam, Netherlands.  This event featured a two title fights for the Glory Welterweight Championship between Nieky Holzken and Murthel Groenhart as headliner, and for the Glory Heavyweight Championship between Rico Verhoeven and Benjamin Adegbuyi as co-headliner.  This event also featured a 4-Man Featherweight Contender Tournament to earn a shot at the Glory Featherweight Championship.
title: Glory 26: Amsterdam
